pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This video consists of a single, static shot of a monument at night. The camera is focused on the top of an ornate arch, which is crowned by a sculpture of a golden figure leading a quadriga of four greenish-blue horses. The entire structure is illuminated from below, highlighting its intricate carvings against the dark night sky.
